# 导弹冲击！(天启)  
> 鸟的十二根尾毛迅速旋转，最后变成了一个大风车加速向你冲来了！  
  
<table class="table table-bordered" data-toggle="table"  data-show-header="false"><thead style="display:none"><tr ><th  style="width:50%;text-align:left;vertical-align:top;"  data-sortable="true"  >title</th><th  style="width:50%;text-align:left;vertical-align:top;"  ></th></tr></thead><tr ><td  style="width:50%;text-align:left;vertical-align:top;"  ></td><td  style="width:50%;text-align:left;vertical-align:top;"  ><div style="float:right; margin:5px"><div class="gamecard" style="width:150px; height:225px;"><a href="tq_Event_GeeseSouth_MissileBird_Attack.md" style="color:black"><img decoding="async" src="Sprite/tq/GeeseSouth_Bird_TypeOne.jpg" class="cardimage" style="max-width:150px;max-height:225px;"><span style="font-size: 25px;">导弹冲击！</span></a></div></div></td></tr></tbody></table>  
  
## 获取来源  
<div style="display:inline-block"><div class="gamedatalist" style="text-align:left;min-width:200px;min-height:0px;"><div style="display:inline-block"><div style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;">Ignore it</div><div style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;">[奇事(事件)](tq_Event_GeeseSouth_MissileBird.md)</div></div></div><div class="gamedatalist" style="text-align:left;min-width:200px;min-height:0px;"><div style="display:inline-block"><div style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;">朝着它大喊大叫</div><div style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;">[奇事(事件)](tq_Event_GeeseSouth_MissileBird.md)</div></div></div><div class="gamedatalist" style="text-align:left;min-width:200px;min-height:0px;"><div style="display:inline-block"><div style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;">Throw Rock at it</div><div style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;">[奇事(事件)](tq_Event_GeeseSouth_MissileBird.md)</div></div></div><div class="gamedatalist" style="text-align:left;min-width:200px;min-height:0px;"><div style="display:inline-block"><div style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;">对着它开始狂舞！</div><div style="display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;">[奇事(事件)](tq_Event_GeeseSouth_MissileBird.md)</div></div></div></div>
